pullrequest.title: Example notebooks: updates for the first three, plus two new application examples

content.raw: All good points.  6 & 7 should have been fixed in the main repo a few week ago.  I can definitely add some info regarding the other points, specifically 4 & 5.  Maybe we should merge this and then address these points with straight pushes, so we don't have to fork and pull to Jeff's fork, etc.?
content.html: All good points. 6 & 7 should have been fixed in the main repo a few week ago. I can definitely add some info regarding the other points, specifically 4 & 5. Maybe we should merge this and then address these points with straight pushes, so we don't have to fork and pull to Jeff's fork, etc.?
